name: Hoosier Hollow
description:
An entry to the 2021 SAAM Game Jam Arcade!

Hoosier Hollows is a game about building a stable community while also embracing each animal's individual needs and wants.  The key to a successful community is not only to meet the community's needs as a whole, but to also fulfill the individual's needs as best as possible!

Controls:
Mouse Only!

Still a WiP!

Game Design: HunterRS, Petarus, FoxDevAlex, & OvenCat

Programming: Petarus & FoxDevAlex

Art: OvenCat

UI Design: Petarus

SFX Design: Kapden

Music: Markro
